snippet: Pierre-Hugues Herbert and Nicolas Mahut became the first French pair to win the United States Open men’s doubles title, easing past Jamie Murray of Britain and John Peers of Australia.
abstract: Frenchmen Pierre-Hugues Herbert and Nicolas Mahut defeat Jamie Murray and John Peers to win United States Open men's doubles title.
lead_paragraph: Pierre-Hugues Herbert and Nicolas Mahut became the first French pair to win the United States Open men’s doubles title, easing past Jamie Murray of Britain and John Peers of Australia.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Frenchmen Take Doubles
